category: Korean University Sports Committee Regulations/Article 14 (Quorum for Decision)
contents: Article 14 (Quorum for decision-making) Except as specifically provided for in these regulations, the general meeting of members shall be opened with the attendance of a majority of registered members, and resolutions shall be made with the approval of a majority of members present. Revised May 15, 2017 [Moved from Article 11, Previous Article 14 moved to Article 21 May 15, 2017]
